xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dq:do-query
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: dq:do-query($context as node()*, $query as xs:string?, $field as xs:string?) as element()*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Returns the elements for which the $query matches.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $field? the name of a field, if the query should be restricted to a specific field
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: element()* : The elements that match the query, typically one of: db5:title, db5:keyword, db5:para, db5:sect1, db5:sect2, db5:sect3.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dq:query
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: dq:query($node as node()*, $model as map(*), $q as xs:string?, $field as xs:string, $view as xs:string) as element()?
